Title: Requires Richmond County to establish a hazards annex to the Richmond county emergency management plan for certain fixed energy storage facilities
Summary: Requires Richmond County to establish a hazards annex to the Richmond county emergency management plan for certain fixed energy storage facilities to ensure that Richmond County is prepared to deal with the potential dangers, such as high-temperature chemical fires, associated with large scale energy storage facilities, including those placed or planned to be placed in assembly district 63.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to requiring Richmond county to establish a hazards annex to the Richmond county emergency management plan for certain fixed energy storage facilities; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
